### How to Cite

When citing posts from this blog, please use the following format:

```
Fisher, C. (Year). Title of post. Local Minimum. URL
```

For example:
```
Fisher, C. (2025). What is Weighted Linear Attention? Local Minimum. https://local-minimum.com/posts/weighted-linear-attention/
```

If you're using BibTeX, you can use this format:
```bibtex
@misc{fisher2025weighted,
  author = {Fisher, Charles},
  title = {What is Weighted Linear Attention?},
  year = {2025},
  howpublished = {Local Minimum},
  url = {https://local-minimum.com/posts/weighted-linear-attention/}
}
```

Please ensure you include the URL to the specific post you're citing.
